name: Cosmic Survivor
description:
Cosmic Survivor is an intense, survival shoot 'em up with roguelite elements, where your skill is on trial and the horde is always waiting. Features a short game loop with rising intensity. Learn the best survival strategy or upgrade your ship over time to climb the Global Leaderboard.

Originally developed for mobile VR, this free version is the full game for Windows. If you'd like to support the developer you can purchase a VR version on AppLabs for the MetaQuest.

Like living dangerously? Jump straight to maniac levels of intensity by pressing "6" on the keyboard at six seconds on the clock.
